name: Anstoss 1-3 Bundle
description:
Please note that Anstoss 2 and Anstoss 3 games are only available in German. While the rules of football/soccer remain universal, knowing the language of the four-time World Cup winners might be very useful to finish both titles mentioned above.


Lace up your boots and go all-in with this cracking Anstoss Classics bundle, featuring fan favorites Anstoss, Anstoss 2 Gold and Anstoss 3. A wonderful walk down memory lane and an absolute must-have for all football fans!


Anstoss 1
The economic simulation for real soccer enthusiasts. Make your way through a successful career as the manager of your own soccer team by always giving your club everything you have got. Act as both trainer and manager, call the right shots and earn the support of the board of directors. There is only one way to become national coach!

Anstoss 2 Gold Edition
Anstoss 2 Gold Edition includes the legendary Soccer Simulation “Anstoss 2” and its “Extra Time” Add-On.

A great team meeting before the game allows you to remind your team once more on how important it is, to win the upcoming match. With over 40 different versions, there will always be the right speech to choose from. Anstoss 2 Gold Edition contains new rules for different types of competitions, a trophy hall, various new statistics, negotiations in between match days and everything that’s part of everyday soccer.

Anstoss 3
Step into the boots of a grass roots football manager and use strategic nous and tactical know-how to bring your team into the big leagues.

As with its predecessors, Anstoss 3 focuses on entertainment, intricate management gameplay and all the realism and excitement of club football. Featuring real 3D simulations, deep management gameplay, and an assortment of options for post-match windfall, such as a stadium expansion, Anstoss 3 is the football management fan’s dream.

Features:
  • Fully rendered 3D match simulation
  • New club area with 300 placeable objects
  • Motion capture technology for dynamic tackling and more than 300 unique goalkeeper actions
  • Roster of 20,000 players and more than 1 million pitches
  • Hundreds of real-life teams from 11 European countries
  • Local multiplayer for up to 4 players


Languages, features and system requirements may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
